segments.text: The boy’s foot slips, and my heart skips a beat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m frozen, waiting to see if he will catch himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His laughter echoes in the kitchen, brightening the otherwise tense atmosphere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl claps her hands, delighting in the thrill of the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a mix of joy and chaos that feels bittersweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But everything could go so wrong in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring, the puddle threatening to expand further.
segments.speaker: PAR
